description: Details pursuant to the partial discharge of Condition 17 part (ii) (Contaminated Land) in respect of Phase 1 only as attached to planning permission ref. 38421/APP/2021/4045 dated 25/11/2022 (Redevelopment of the site to deliver data centre campus including: two data centre buildings (Use Class B8); associated energy and electricity infrastructure, buildings, and plant; security gatehouse, systems and enclosures; works to the highway, car parking and cycle parking; hard and soft landscaping; as well as associated infrastructure, ancillary office use, and associated external works).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Please be advised that this application permits the partial discharge of Condition 17 part (ii) (Contaminated Land) in respect of Phase 1 only as attached to planning permission ref. 38421/APP/2021/4045. As per part (ii) of Condition 17, if further contamination is identified and it has not been addressed by the information submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority, please be advised that Condition 17 part (ii) will need to be re-discharged.
